title: WHY DOES THIS HAPPEN
body: i have just dowloaded the game, made sure my computer had all the required specs, but every time i try to open the game i get a pop up saying "another instance of launcher is running. would you like to terminate it?" and no matter if i press okay or cancel or nothing at all, it stops the start up of the game. please helpme fix this problem, i havent even been able to get to the home screen.

replies.body: The first step I recommend is the *classic IT* response of *"restart your PC"* to see if anything changes. If it doesn't, can you let me know if you're using Mac OS or Windows?

http://www.dumpaday.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/08/life-support.jpg

If it doesn't work then this is most likely a permission problem, that's my estimation though.

Say.... are you tech savy?
Cause I have a case over on EU, where a user is having Maestro errors 2-3 minutes after logging in, forcing his client to close.

He's tried:

* Everything in the Connection KB article without luck.
* Contacted support, who were unable to help him.
* Restarted his computer with excess programs disabled (by using msconfig), which also didn't work.
  * Provided me with both a Process and Service list of what's running in the clean boot.
* Restarted in Safe mode with networking, doing this 'resolved' his bug.
  * Provided me with both a Process and Service list for comparison purposes.

> tasklist /v > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Process.txt"
> net start > "%USERPROFILE%\desktop\Start Process.txt"


[This thread](http://boards.eune.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/WpwZnUX5-maestro-error-still-appearing-after-everything-i-tried-i-could-find-on-google-reddit-and-support)

****

Someone poked me about this earlier, thought you might have an interest, seems to work as far as I've been able to confirm.

> If you encounter players who have had a windows 10 update recently and losing fps, then tell them to
> Press the start button in the left bottom cone.
> Click All apps and open Xbox App.
> Go to settings > Game DVR and deactivate "Take screenshots using Game DVR".
> it will 100% fix, with the cases i've seen around all the boards, till windows 10 has another update
Have you tried re-installing League of Legends?
